title: Legacy Client Removed?
body:
Has the legacy client been removed? 
It is not available for launch from the beta client; and also launching through the main directory only opens beta.

replies.body:
Yea, the legacy client has been fully deprecated. You can find out more about why from the latest news post:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/new-client-rollout-phase-2
can u guys fix the bug i sented to u guys plsssss{{item:3070}}
What bug are you talking about? It may be something native to your client which you simply need to run a client repair for.
i tried repair but it didn't work
Is it a bug with the splash client (the new client) or the game client (in game/loading screen stuff)? If it's the game client you may have to reinstall League entirely.
